N82E16834233250.Title: Excellent Product, with a few minor caveats
N82E16834233250.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834233250.Cons: Sound is not as great as anticipated the speakers are adequate, but not surprising to see what Gigabyte could cram in such a small machine.
N82E16834233250.Pros: Incredibly fast - this laptop is a powerhouse with the 9th gen i7, 32 GB of RAM - plus the 2070, it can handle video editing, programming and gaming. Using this as a creative laptop, it really is shocking to see how much this can take on as far as multitasking.
N82E16834233250.Comments: Overall if you need a desktop replacement in a portable package and have the money, this laptop is a great choice. Among the competition in Razer, MSI, Asus, Lenovo, Alienware and the others in the gaming laptop market, this machine performs above the margin. It's a great choice, but remember there are always other options out there. Having to use this for work, specifically website design and video editing, it works like a charm in all areas.

N82E16834317538.Author: Anonymous

N82E16834317538.Pros: The negatives outweigh any possible pros.
N82E16834317538.Comments: Please do not buy this computer. I really don't want anyone to fall for the same scam.

N82E16834317538.Title: Powerful Laptop-
N82E16834317538.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834317538.Cons: Ok. I don't like the touchpad, it needs dedicated Left Click/Right Click buttons. Also; it seems like the Wireless AC like to "power down" over time, it works fast after resetting it but an hour later all your web browsing will crawl. That may be my router though. The battery on this is not impressive, you'll be lucky to get 2-3 hours out of it just web browsing. The screen is dim, you'll need to have it maxed out 90% of the time. The graphics on this thing is weird too, I can't describe it but it's like the HD4600 is "reverse throttled" and it's like paired with the 860M they 'work together' I think. (Not SLI just, they are aware of each other) Oh, Windows 8 is horrible- immediately install Windows 7. Despite the internet, their are drivers that easily install the 860M up to FULL SPEED (10.18.10.3960). Oh, did I mention the touchpad? : ) One more thing, you cannot use an external mouse *ON* this laptop, the matte surface doesn't work well with lasers.
N82E16834317538.Pros: I can get 75 GFLOPS out of this thing on QuikMark; without using 100% procesor power. The 860M is so awesome, Skyrim on Max 60FPS no problem. It can handle anything you throw at it. I even use it for work and it's speed has increased my productivity. Speed aside, this thing has the BEST SPEAKERS I've ever heard on a laptop. The DOLBY profile panel makes all sound jump off of your integrated OR external speakers. Super Slim and Sexy, Backlit Keyboard.
N82E16834317538.Comments: You know it's an amazing machine, all quirks aside. It's nice to play games basically at max settings. The keyboard is fine don't worry (I'm a programmer); it has decent tactile feedback. The Fn keys dont always work (touchpad on/off, airplane mode, ect). Oh, this thing will awake from sleep if you just open the lid- can't seem to fix that. I was barely affected by the lack of DVDROM, the USB drive was fine to install Win 7. SSHD gets 111Mb/sec on QuikMark, which isn't quite what I expected. Overall? BUY THIS THING! Lenovo did a great job! I <3 my Y50!

N82E16834246162.Title: Almost three years
N82E16834246162.Author: Ted F.
N82E16834246162.Cons: Didn't work when I first got it and by the time I found out, the 30 day warranty had run out. I took it to a near by shop and they couldn't repair it. It seemed like the Battery was intermittent and the power cord was loose or something. It just kept rebooting without warning. I started trying to upgrade all the drivers and discovered the trouble was with the wireless driver. Once I replaced that, the Machine started working properly. I still get a blue screen occasionally on Battery, but if it's plugged in it works fine and is actually faster than some of my desk tops. So now I love it and use it a lot and take it every where. It's older so it will not connect to some newer Wifi. Most of the time Wifi works great with the latest Intel driver
N82E16834246162.Pros: Great after I fixed it. I Surf the web, do a lot of e-mail. Does those things fine. Watch most Videos without too much effort. I've owned this laptop about three years now.
N82E16834246162.Comments: Still using this. It's 1/11/16 now and this week I had to re-install everything to it's factory defaults because of some suspected Malware, but otherwise it's running great. It redid the hard drive easily and is running faster again. Although I had to download about 150 Microsoft updates! That took all night. Still using Win XP. I often buy refurbished and most of the time it's a good buy. Once in a while you get a problem, but they do get tested before they go out.

N82E16834246162.Title: Good deal !
N82E16834246162.Author: Anonymous

N82E16834297022.Cons: Default Power save mode on battery settings lowers game FPS, but can change settings it in Advanced Power options
N82E16834297022.Comments: My son is slowly taking over my PS4 so I purchased this so I could be in the same room with him but still do some work and play my own games. Have tried the new MMO Black Desert Online, TheGolfClub, Divinity Original Sin and Elder Scrolls Skyrim and they all ran smoothly, and quietly. In contrast the PS4 game console cooling fans sound like a turbo-jet taking flight.

N82E16834297022.Title: Does Not Come with SSD
N82E16834297022.Author: Charles S.
N82E16834297022.Cons: Unfortunately, this laptop is incorrectly listed on Newegg. The listing claims that it comes with an 8GB SSD, but after opening the back panel, I can verify that my laptop definitely did not. When I contacted Newegg about it, they said I would have to (understandably) send in the laptop to verify that it doesn't have the 8GB drive. I need this computer, and the process would take a week. It wasn't worth it for me to send in the laptop for a drive that is worth about $20 at most.
N82E16834297022.Pros: I have had this laptop for about a week now, and it seems to be stable, fast, and has an absolutely beautiful screen. I'm coming from Windows 7, and I was dreading the change to Windows 10. I'm not super happy with it, but it is bearable. Overall, the hardware choices made in this laptop seem to work well, and it can play most games at fairly high settings.
N82E16834297022.Comments: Like I said above, this is a great laptop, but I can't give it 5 eggs because Newegg has not responded well to my concerns about an incorrect listing on their site. Even after calling their customer support, they told me to take the issue up with Dell, as their laptops supposedly have the 8GB SSD in them. I cannot see how this is true, as they come from the manufacturer without the SSD.

N82E16834319464.Title: Refurb done right
N82E16834319464.Author: Lawrence L.
N82E16834319464.Cons: Battery does not hold a full charge, but good enough for temporary use.  Both are being used as desktop replacements, so battery life not an issue.
N82E16834319464.Pros: I bought 2 of these a year ago, several months apart, for friends, both computer novices.  One had an OLD desktop, prone to part failures.  The other is "older"; web surfing, e-mail, and skype sufficient.
N82E16834319464.Comments: Bought 2 used Lenovo ThinkPad Mini Dock Series 3 USB 3.0 Type 4337 04W3587 w/Power Supply for the "upgraded" one plus one for my own use (it fits the T410, T420, and T430); works great (NOTE:  the T420 does not have USB3, only USB2; just upward compatible).  One advantage of the docking station is that it uses separate headphone/mike jacks.  The on-board headphone/mike jacks on these Thinkpads are a combined jack, so you'll need to buy an adapter if using those.

N82E16834319464.Title: Great product for the price!

N82E16834319464.Cons: Its kind of heavy to carry, but within a week or so I got used to it in my bag. - It can be a bit noisy after having it on for a few hours. - Typing on the keyboard is a bit loud, but you only notice it when you're in a quiet place.
N82E16834319464.Pros: I bought this laptop well over a year ago and its still runs like a beauty. I'm a university student who already owns a high end gaming pc and I just needed something to access the internet, write word documents, and read pdf files. The laptop was brand new when I got it. Came with the windows key which I immediately upgraded to windows 10. Keyboard and track pad are really nice. Overall its a great budget laptop!
N82E16834319464.Comments: I would highly recommend switching to 8gb of ram, especially if you're a university student who has lots of tabs and pdf files opened at once. Also adding an SSD and configuring your setup for two drives is really nice. Tons of youtube videos and forums to look at if you're thinking of doing both.

N82E16834314539.Title: Great Laptop!
N82E16834314539.Author: Tina L.
N82E16834314539.Cons: Secure-Boot is not the easiest thing to disable.  (see pros)
N82E16834314539.Pros: Linux Compatibility!  No issues with any device when installing Linux Mint 17.1 (Rebecca).  Multitouch trackpad actually worked better than it did with Windows 8.1 out of the box.  For Windows, make sure you update your drivers!  The trackpad kinda sucks (as mentioned in other reviews) but the latest driver update completely eliminated all issues!  For Linux you will need to go into the BIOS and disable Secure-Boot.  Fairly simple but you will need to set a BIOS password before it will allow you to change this setting (you can disable it when finished).  Once secureboot is disabled everything works great for a dual-boot with no additional changes.
N82E16834314539.Comments: Great Battery Life!!! Mint gets me an hour longer than windows.

N82E16834314539.Title: Review of Acer Aspire E1-571-6837
N82E16834314539.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834314539.Cons: Wifi, touchpad, and support. The wireless had connection problems out of the box, and Acer tech support was no help. They had me uninstall and reinstall the wireless driver (uninstall and simply reboot to have it reinstalled), but this did not help. I finally found a post online suggesting to disable the "power saving feature" on the wireless adaptor (gee do we really need that?), and this got it working. All that was over a year ago. Thought I was good. However, now my daughter took it to college, and it won't connect at the apartment. All other devices are connecting there with no problem. Pulling my hair out. Acer still no help. Purchased a USB wireless adaptor, which is working. Other con is the goofy touchpad, which has a mind of its own and drove my wife crazy when she would use it. I would tell her to plug in a mouse, but that doesn't work when sitting on the sofa.
N82E16834314539.Comments: This was a review of a previous generation Aspire (E1-571-6837), but I'm posting it here because the E5-571-5552 the most similar currently available model. Running Windows 8.

N82E16834231567.Title: Update
N82E16834231567.Author: Katey S.
N82E16834231567.Cons: Slow in almost every way possible, absolutely terrible speakers, can't look at or repair any internal pieces because the back is totally sealed shut. Read "other thoughts" for more.
N82E16834231567.Pros: It was cheap, had a disc drive, and only 2 other reviews at the time that said it was decent.
N82E16834231567.Comments: You get what you pay for, I guess. Don't buy this. When I first got it about six months ago, it was messed up during updating and was just slow in general once I got it working. It's still slow as heck and the graphics are awful. I can't play any games whatsoever. It freezes constantly, especially when using the internet (high quality internet) even at times when I had been submitting assignments for school, which sucked. The speakers are absolutely terrible and have been warbled off and on, but finally after six months of owning this laptop, they suddenly just gave out for no reason and any tiny noise like a facebook notification is very loud, drawn out static. I've plugged in computer speakers, headphones, etc and the sound is the same terrible noise. I have taken great care with this laptop, but these things have still happened. The back doesn't come off, so there's no way to get inside the computer. I can't return it because the warranty was only 30 days. My experience with the laptop has been really not great and even if I could send it in to get it looked at (somehow, even though you can't psychically look inside it to repair any internal things), I wouldn't want it back again. Looks like I'm stuck with this until I can afford to buy a new laptop. Waste of $300.

N82E16834231567.Title: An exercise in in futility
N82E16834231567.Author: Cass B.
N82E16834231567.Cons: I'm an ASUS fan.  I have two ASUS routers and an awesome RoG laptop that I souped up a bit.  Sadly, this laptop is inferior junk, falling far, far below what I expect from ASUS.  Out of the box, it wouldn't update to 8.1 correctly.  It would hit update 112 out of 113 and fail, resulting in an OS rollback.
N82E16834231567.Pros: There are none.  All pros are outweighed by the cons.
N82E16834231567.Comments: It's quite possible I have a single bad instance of this model.  It doesn't matter, this laptop is awful in the most important way possible.  It doesn't work at all.  I absolutely regret this purchase and will never buy another cheap ASUS laptop.

N82E16834231567.Author: jay r.
N82E16834231567.Cons: doesn't work out of the box and VERY cheaply made. The plastic border around screen had waves and gaps.

N82E16834231567.Title: Its good while it works
N82E16834231567.Author: Alejandro j.
N82E16834231567.Cons: 3 months after I purchased this notebook, the hard drive stopped working and I lost many important document and files. However I contacted asus technical support for warranty service  and they were able to help me get it fixed. The service was reliable because i was able to receive my product back with in 7 days. Only thing they did was replace the hard drive with a smaller capacity of 250 gb. Before the original hard drive offered 500gb. I wasn't to happy with that but It would do fine for me since I have a 1TB external drive.
N82E16834231567.Pros: I bought this notebook for school purposes. I usually run microsoft word, power point, adobe reader, internet browser, and occasionally for games. It suits my purpose because i'm able to carry this notebook with me to school and back and work on tasks on the go. The boot speed is average depending on my how much data is on the hard drive. It runs smoothly when I play music through it, and im able to run a hdmi out to a sound system to receive the best quality it can offer.
N82E16834231567.Comments: Overall if you are looking for a notebook that is going to be used for typing essays,researching, or casual browsing i would recommend it but for an extra 100$ you can get a more reliable laptop

N82E16834231727.Title: laptop function quite decent, but no recovery media or support
N82E16834231727.Author: Yannan Z.
N82E16834231727.Cons: I contacted ASUS for warranty support when I need to re-install the system, because I could not find any recovery option or media.  They responded that I will need to ship it back to them for them to do the re-installation.  Considering that how other companies such as HP and Dell provide recovery partition and media (and flown to me overnight), ASUS failed in tech and customer support.
N82E16834231727.Pros: Everything about the laptop is OK, especially when you buy it during Black Friday.

N82E16834231727.Title: Great Notebook
N82E16834231727.Author: Andrew D.
N82E16834231727.Comments: Bought this for my mother who's laptop finally became unusable, for many reasons. At the time of purchase, this notebook was on sale for about 230$ brand new (non-refurb). Knowing that you get what you pay for, I took a gamble on this machine. I was actually quite surprised. I remain very picky about notebook PC's, and this one passed my skepticism.

N82E16834231727.Title: Waste of money
N82E16834231727.Author: Scott S.
N82E16834231727.Cons: Very slow but what can you expect for the price

N82E16834231727.Title: Cheap
N82E16834231727.Author: David D.
N82E16834231727.Cons: Cheaply made. F  keys didn't work. Got blue screen when you plug in a usb

N82E16834231727.Title: Adware and Dysfunctional Drivers
N82E16834231727.Author: Andrew P.
N82E16834231727.Cons: I was expecting this thing to be on the weak side. It is incredibly slow, this machine, and I was willing to tolerate that, but the fact this thing came with adware and malware such as this annoying clearthink is really frustrating. I kind of regret getting this thing even if it was cheap.
N82E16834231727.Pros: I need more time to find any pros.

N82E16834231727.Title: Great Laptop
N82E16834231727.Author: Anthony H.
N82E16834231727.Cons: I really dislike windows 8, hopefully that will all change with updates. (there are currently over 90 to install.)
N82E16834231727.Comments: Bought this laptop for my wife and she loves it. She doesn't use any demanding software or play video games so its perfect for her.

N82E16834231727.Title: My Notebook Review
N82E16834231727.Author: Donald M.
N82E16834231727.Cons: I do not like all the junky Win-8 gimmick boxes wanting to sell me products. Over 80+ Updates had to be downloaded!  No manual or literature to help me!  I discovered my D550MA has an X551MA inside!  I have no idea what this means for me (good or bad). The 116 page online downloadable manual is generic and not specific to my notebook! Seems seller and manufacturer are not too knowledgeable about this and advertised it having Touch Screen when I bought it. But, NO touch screen!
N82E16834231727.Pros: The notebook works, looks nice and seems fast to be ready to function.  I have had several communications with Newegg reps and Asus reps which helped me somewhat  understand how to best use which ever version of Asus I received. It seems my notebook is a newer modified version called X-Series. It has an X551MA mother board inside which might be great (according to ID system).  My opening screen and systems data list indicates model, as does the original box the computer arrived in, which has a paper stick-on marked X551.
N82E16834231727.Comments: I am trying to get answers as to what kind of computer do I really have!  I am not unhappy with the price but a "machine in a box" is really a poor way to help a customer use a new device with no real assistance. Item did not match Newegg's online ad and photo of it! What to do is really a headache!

N82E16834231684.Title: 5 year review
N82E16834231684.Author: Kornelijus K.
N82E16834231684.Comments: Yeah, so i've used this laptop for 5 years now. Would i buy it again? Probably not, but then again it was a pretty good deal at the time.

N82E16834231684.Title: Black Screen of Death!
N82E16834231684.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834231684.Cons: Screen issues started happening after a year of using it, now 4 years later it is completed burned out. Gets way to hot when using it.
N82E16834231684.Comments: I would not recommend this laptop.  I feel like a wasted $1000 on this product. After 4 years of using it, which was only once in a while, the screen won't turn out. Called Asus said it would cost me about $500 to replace and fix, same quote at other repair shops. Waste of money, staying away from ASUS from here on out.

N82E16834231684.Title: Overall it functions as promised, I purchased it like 3 years ago online.
N82E16834231684.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834231684.Cons: I use it as a desktop a lot even though I have a desktop because of the ongoing screen problem with it, I'm using an external monitor just because I like a bigger display as well.
N82E16834231684.Pros: Fast processor for handling about any games on normal settings, quite fast with windows 10 install in terms of boot time, I'd recommend a ssd drive if you are concerned with slow boot time. SSD is what I have and boots in less than 5 seconds. The HDD takes about 20 seconds. Its overall a great machine.
N82E16834231684.Comments: I get what people say about the screen, its a simple fix. I travel back and forth to school and if the laptop bounces around in your bag or in the car when u hit bumps, even sometimes when u open it up it will loosen the screen connection to the motherboard. Happens like once every month. Also a big thing to point out is it has a power saving mode which will make your fps clunky is what some of these reviewers are referring to when they say it is slow. Its as simple as pressing FN+SPACE to turn off power saving mode.

N82E16834231684.Title: Save your money and buy something reliable
N82E16834231684.Author: James W.
N82E16834231684.Cons: TLDR - It may be a little cheaper than some other options but it will probably break on you / have other issues. Either get a better laptop for a little bit more money or just build a desktop. This laptop will waste your money and your time. Also - be wary of the warranty department not actually fixing your laptop when you send it to them. They provided no information on what they even worked on.
N82E16834231684.Pros: - Laptop seemed to be a good deal given what the specs were

N82E16834231684.Title: Terrible Laptop
N82E16834231684.Author: Nathalie D.
N82E16834231684.Cons: Bought this laptop with the intention of using it for the next 5 years, this wasn't the case.
N82E16834231684.Pros: The design was nice, laptop ran many high programs with ease. I really liked this laptop, and it could have been great-if it had lasted.
N82E16834231684.Comments: I wouldn't recommend this to anyone else.

N82E16834231684.Title: Awful
N82E16834231684.Author: Alexander B.
N82E16834231684.Pros: Worked mildly well for the first 9 months
N82E16834231684.Comments: Laptop won't work and for the last 3 months Asus has been denying RMA claims telling us we don't need one.  I have a brick sitting here because Asus won't honor their warranty.

N82E16834231684.Title: best window 10 touch laptop
N82E16834231684.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834231684.Pros: great price and quality products. totally satisfy.

N82E16834231684.Title: Great Potential but Severe Weak Points
N82E16834231684.Author: MATTHEW B.
N82E16834231684.Cons: Display – Theoretically, the display should be very good since it is a modern, full HD IPS. However, theory and specs don't always deliver. Around the edges, the display burns very easily (e.g., maximizing a web browser for five minutes and then minimizing it will leave a very noticeable imprint or burn mark where the address bar was; the burn will remain for quite a while, and the URL may even be distinguishable). This is a blatant and inexcusable manufacturing defect. Also, the display bleeds at the bottom, and there are discolored light spots in the center of the screen, which I believe to be caused by the lit logo on the back.
N82E16834231684.Pros: I'd like to write a very honest and balanced review of this product. I've had this notebook since August, 2014. I'll list the good and the bad that most stood out to me.
N82E16834231684.Comments: Overall, I am not pleased with this notebook due to the major manufacturer defects. If you've read this far, you may want to know some of the experiences I've had with ASUS.

N82E16834232393.Title: ASUS Zenbook UX305
N82E16834232393.Author: KATHRYN M.
N82E16834232393.Cons: What folks say is true. The volume is very low. But that is my only complaint. If I plug in a speaker problem solved.
N82E16834232393.Pros: Great computer. Especially love how lightweight it is -- traveling on planes is much less of a burden then my old laptop! Love how  easy the keyboard works too. And the battery life is the best!
N82E16834232393.Comments: Better speaker. Otherwise I love it.

N82E16834232393.Title: Seemed like  great value; turned out to be very glitchy
N82E16834232393.Author: Casey T.
N82E16834232393.Pros: - Had lots of upgrades for the money, compared to similar competitive offerings
N82E16834232393.Comments: - I would not recommend this product to others; if it ran as it was supposed to, this would have been a very good laptop for the money.  As it is, it has been nothing but problems for 9 months now.  I bought this for my college-age daughter, and I was recently made aware just how badly performing this laptop has been.  Very disappointed!

N82E16834232393.Title: The Honda Civic of Laptops
N82E16834232393.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834232393.Cons: Awkward screen resolution, IPS display leaks some light, ASUS Smart Gesture
N82E16834232393.Pros: TDP, battery life, portability, aluminum body, price
N82E16834232393.Comments: After much research I chose this for the value. The Core M handles Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom, some patience necessary. I removed the 32 bit OS for a 64 bit version, which utilizes the RAM much better.

N82E16834232393.Title: Awesome
N82E16834232393.Author: Steven C.
N82E16834232393.Pros: Very light and thin, not super expensive.

N82E16834232393.Title: Perfect for me!
N82E16834232393.Author: Joao L.
N82E16834232393.Cons: The touchpad is the only negative feature.
N82E16834232393.Pros: It is the perfect product if you are looking for a portable notebook! It is extremely light and thin. It has a pretty good hardware as well. The battery last at least 5 hours. I am running Linux Mint 17.2 and it is working perfect so far. I am using this notebook for almost 5 months.

N82E16834232393.Title: Will not purchase Asus again!!!
N82E16834232393.Author: Yaroslav K.
N82E16834232393.Cons: Horrible, terrible, unbelievable Quality control.....  Asus made this Laptop with their eyes closed.... Really bad back light bleed, horrible mouse track pad.  screen quality is HD if you put imaginary HD glasses on, ITS IS REALLY BAD QUALITY.  I had to send this laptop for repair 4 times, on the 4th time they replaced my laptop with a refurbished one and it is even worse than the one i had...... i will never be buying an Asus product again because of this experience....

N82E16834232393.Title: Asus is by far the best!
N82E16834232393.Author: Charles B.
N82E16834232393.Pros: Probably one of the finest laptops I've ever touched. Fast, well packaged, wonderful design. More than enough room on the hard drive for 99% of the users I've encountered. and I have built, and worked on desktops, and laptops for 25 years. I love the sleek design, Metal body not cheap plastic. Light high quality display. just a really awesome design, for anyone looking for a smaller, lighter, more portable design. 13.3" is the perfect size even for my 55 year old eyes. I really think you cant go wrong with Asus.
N82E16834232393.Comments: I now own the upper verzion the I7 rocks. I upgraded the UX305 to Windows 10 flawlessly.

N82E16834232393.Title: Love this laptop!
N82E16834232393.Author: Michael L.
N82E16834232393.Cons: I never got used to the "click pad" instead of separate track pad and buttons.  I use a USB mouse instead.  The power "on/off" button is right next to the "delete" button.  It took me about a month before I stopped turning it off when I wanted to delete a character.  The batter lasts more like 5 or 6 hours than 8 hours.  I still consider that really good.  Other than these, this would be getting 5 stars.
N82E16834232393.Pros: I've had this laptop for 7 months now and have grown to really, really like it.
N82E16834232393.Comments: Great performing laptop at a very reasonable price!

N82E16834319445.Title: Good Value Notebook
N82E16834319445.Author: Douglas A.
N82E16834319445.Cons: Not a power computer!  It is SLOW with native HDD.  Not a con as you get what you pay for, right?  So if you buy this as is and expect it to startup fast and run apps at blazing speeds you will be disappointing.
N82E16834319445.Pros: Price:  Cheap  and still provide decent processing power for basics tasks: Websurfing, email, Light Office work (no heavy excel work), watch online videos.
N82E16834319445.Comments: This has been running for over 1.5 years now without any issues.  It is my wife's  goto notebook and is used everyday for standard home usage (as described in "Pros" above).  She has not complained about slowness or performance (I attribute the SSD and RAM upgrade for < $100 at the time)

N82E16834319445.Title: Defective product; worthless warranty.  DO NOT BUY LENOVO!  EVER!
N82E16834319445.Author: David C.
N82E16834319445.Cons: Screen stopped working after a few months.  Laptop was rarely used, no scratches, not dropped.  But when I reported the non-functional screen, Lenovo declined to honor the warranty.  Buying their product is like throwing money out the window.
N82E16834319445.Pros: There might be some -- if it worked!$
N82E16834319445.Comments: Not reliable, warranty is worthless, manufacturer does not stand behind the product.  Do not buy.

N82E16834319445.Title: Perfect for everyday use!
N82E16834319445.Author: KULWINDER D.
N82E16834319445.Pros: This laptop is everything I was looking for - cheap, good quality and reliable!  I have had it for some months now and am very satisfied with this purchase.  I would recommend it to anybody who is just doing regular Youtube surfing, etc.  Worth it!
N82E16834319445.Comments: I would absolutely recommend this product!

N82E16834319445.Title: School Laptop
N82E16834319445.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834319445.Cons: Have had some problems after upgrading to Windows 10. The screen had randomly gone black a few times and have had to take out battery(absolutely last thing you want to do) to reset it. Not sure about a fix, but it hasn't done it in about a month.
N82E16834319445.Pros: This laptop is definitely good enough for a student who needs something to connect to the Internet and use for word or photoshop. Fast boot time and a good amount of hard drive space.
N82E16834319445.Comments: Make sure to get rid of the typical Lenovo adware that comes stock. Should speed it up even more.

N82E16834319445.Title: Overpriced
N82E16834319445.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834319445.Cons: Drivers - Drivers for Windows 10 seem to be okay, but the ones for Windows 7 were mixed in with 8 on Lenovo's website such that you actully needed to install Windows 8 drivers on the 7 machine.
N82E16834319445.Pros: Battery Life - Depending on the options you use through Lenovo's "Energy Manager" program I've seen 2-6 hours. You need to switch between energy usage modes manually, and you'll notice the performance change accordingly.
N82E16834319445.Comments: Superfish - Few people seem to known about an advertising program Lenovo loads (or used to load) onto their suite of software which comes as bloatware on PCs they sell which is essentially pre-installed adware. After working for a few hours I managed to completely remove the stock OS and replace it with Windows 7.

N82E16834319445.Title: Has a mind of its own.
N82E16834319445.Author: Ronald H.
N82E16834319445.Cons: It is SO THIN that that anything beyond the slightest pressure on the area in front of the keyboard causes it to go haywire, pressing buttons at random, often the control key or the arrow keys. If you have the habit of resting your palm on the front of the computer then do not buy this computer as it will go haywire regularly.
N82E16834319445.Pros: It has plenty of storage and is fast enough for what I need it for.
N82E16834319445.Comments: I am not happy that I bought this laptop and I would not recommend it.

N82E16834319445.Title: Good laptop after alot of work
N82E16834319445.Author: Kathleen M.
N82E16834319445.Cons: Cleanup on this laptop to make it usable took about 4 hours. Could have been quicker but with so much garbage on it, it wasnt even able to load the task manager screen when pushing ctrl+alt+del. And any thing attempting to load took 2 min. After i got Mcafee or however its spelled off of it i was then able to easily start removing the other garbage.
N82E16834319445.Pros: After cleanup this laptop works great, loads decent, reliable.
N82E16834319445.Comments: Any thing running Mcafee on it will have issues till it is removed. Running without anti-virus is better than that. And loads of free options to choose from that are good.

N82E16834314150.Title: Reflecting on this after nearly three years
N82E16834314150.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834314150.Cons: Cheap and flimsy chassis that begins to chip off / crumble apart depending on heat exposure, Screen receives imprints from keyboard upon closing, Poor ventilation and internal cooling
N82E16834314150.Pros: Good price point upon release ($450~), Lightweight, Specs good enough for non-intensive work, Upgrades to W10 decently
N82E16834314150.Comments: Replace the HDD with a SSD and you'll be set unless you want to do some gaming. Served me  well for nearly 3 years as a main PC with heavy commute, university coursework, and raster-based graphics work with programs like Photoshop. Only stopped using it when the cheap plastic casing started literally breaking apart due to the constant exertion of heat from heavier work. Still worth a look if you can get it cheap or second-hand, but at a  mid range price point coupled with a subpar build quality, you can definitely find a lightweight laptop or tablet with better specs nowadays.

N82E16834314150.Title: Absolutely horrible
N82E16834314150.Author: CARLOS M.
N82E16834314150.Cons: It is absolutely ridiculous that these days a laptop cannot go more than 3 months without having some sort of critical error, I do not appreciate burning my hard earned money on a product that will die out only a few days later. This is Acer, a manufacturer that I used to believe was quite decent. I've used their laptops before, which is why I decided to purchase this one. Big mistake.
N82E16834314150.Pros: If this machine didn't fail after only 2 months, I would be more willing to write down the pros.
N82E16834314150.Comments: So I am on the Acer tech support website, filling out the request for a system repair. After spending a lot of time answering all their stupid questions, I get close to finishing. I take a simply break to take a picture of the problem so Acer has something to use as reference and what happens when I return? My request has "timed-out", meaning I had to go through the whole process again.

N82E16834314150.Title: Cannot connect to 5GHz band wireless!!!
N82E16834314150.Author: paul l.
N82E16834314150.Cons: It is slower than expected considering it is i5!. Also, I have a d-link router that allows me to set up two networks (2.4GHz and 5GHz). I am able to connect to 2.4 GHz fine, but 5GHz is not recognized by the laptop. Why???? It just doesn't make sense to me why they will make a laptop that won't allow me to connect to a faster network! If any Acer tech support can help me, please let me know!
N82E16834314150.Pros: It's light. The price is reasonable. Battery life is pretty decent

N82E16834314150.Title: Great value laptop
N82E16834314150.Author: FRANKLIN I.
N82E16834314150.Cons: Keys are nearly too far apart.
N82E16834314150.Pros: Upgrading HDD and RAM is easy
N82E16834314150.Comments: I upgraded to an SSD after I received it and it runs beautifully. It only requires one screw to access the RAM and a second screw to remove the HDD.

N82E16834314150.Title: Great Laptop.
N82E16834314150.Author: Christopher B.
N82E16834314150.Pros: Size - The size of this laptop is absolutely perfect. Not too big and not too small, really sleek design, and very light.
N82E16834314150.Comments: If you're looking to buy a good laptop that sits in the range below quad core prices and gaming prices, I would definitely recommend this one. The integrated graphics could be a little better but I didn't really buy this for gaming, however if you do decide to game a bit it's playable except for high end modern games. Plays older games well.

N82E16834314150.Title: Great For The Price!
N82E16834314150.Author: Amanda S.
N82E16834314150.Cons: The battery life isn't great. There's a fair amount of Bloatware that needs to be removed. The touchpad is way too sensitive. I had to disable click on touch and just use the buttons as I was constantly moving and clicking things when typing.
N82E16834314150.Pros: Lightweight and it processes fast enough for the price. The screen is bright and the sound is OK. Num pad on the keyboard is a plus. Large hard drive for storage is great. 4GB of RAM is OK, but will be buying an additional 4GB soon. Windows 8 works well enough after you install the 8.1 update.
N82E16834314150.Comments: I would suggest immediately downloading the Windows 8.1 update. For those of you who miss Windows 7, try downloading Classic Shell. It will give you the old Start Menu back and it works like a charm.

N82E16834314150.Title: Very unhappy sound failed @ 5 months
N82E16834314150.Author: Stephen S.
N82E16834314150.Comments: The sound has failed in the built in speakers at 5 months.  Acer tech support tells me I have to blow away everything I have installed (a LOT!) on this computer to determine for sure if it is a hardware problem.  I'm not willing to lose several days re-installing everything, so I guess I'll use external speakers on this piece of junk.  Don't buy an Acer!

N82E16834314150.Title: round one...
N82E16834314150.Author: jonathan b.
N82E16834314150.Comments: I sent it back and will update when I receive another one. You get what you pay for I guess.

N82E16834313642.Title: PLEASE say WHO refurbed it!!!
N82E16834313642.Author: Ann F.
N82E16834313642.Cons: A review describing the condition of the laptop is not at all helpful unless you include the seller who did the refurb (there are three sellers for this item).
N82E16834313642.Pros: Condition descriptions are great, but don't mean much if there are 3 sellers and we don't know which one you bought from.
N82E16834313642.Comments: A review describing the condition of the laptop is not at all helpful unless you include the seller who did the refurb (there are three sellers for this item).

N82E16834313642.Title: Excellent. As good as new.
N82E16834313642.Author: David H.
N82E16834313642.Pros: I purchased 15 of these for a business project.

N82E16834313642.Title: A very standard piece
N82E16834313642.Author: Jack K.
N82E16834313642.Cons: Intel HD Graphics. Not Intel HD Graphics 2000/3000/4000, just Intel HD Graphics. Good luck with that.
N82E16834313642.Pros: I am satisfied with this laptop. It can play Counter Strike Source with 60 FPS (among other source engine games), Terraria, World of Warcraft, League of Legends. It gets the job done.

N82E16834313642.Title: Bad Battery with Unit
N82E16834313642.Author: Roderick P.
N82E16834313642.Cons: Battery that was shipped with unit is at half of its full potential capacity.

N82E16834313642.Title: Exceeds Expectations
N82E16834313642.Author: Mark W.
N82E16834313642.Cons: The first laptop had overheating issues.  Unfortunately this is the chance you take when ordering refurbished.  I had a great experience getting in replaced.  I WOULD order from Atlanta Electronics again!
N82E16834313642.Pros: For the average user, this laptop will exceed expectations. My initial purchase had to be returned (4 eggs instead of 5).  Atlanta Electronics was EXCELLENT through this process.  A little over a week later I had a clean laptop in great condition.  I removed windows 7 and installed windows 8.1 ... something I would recommend if you are comfortable with this.
N82E16834313642.Comments: This laptop is clean and in excellent condition.  It is my first purchase of a refurbished computer.  I was hesitant, however I have no regrets.  I would do it again through Atlanta Electronics.

N82E16834313642.Title: Delivered as Advertised. Great Buy for the Price!
N82E16834313642.Author: Craig C.
N82E16834313642.Pros: T410 was delivered as advertised and came in better shape than expected. This refurbished computer looks almost new with very few nicks and scratches. The prior person or company really took care of this machine. Fast shipping and sellers are responsive to any inquiries and concerns. Great buy for the price!
N82E16834313642.Comments: Reach out to the sellers with any questions about the Hardware or Specs. They are very responsive and will get back to you right away. I had a few questions before I bought and had them all answered within a few hours and I was able to make my purchase with no worries.

N82E16834313642.Title: Wonderfull laptop

N82E16834314806.Title: I Think It Does me right
N82E16834314806.Author: David B.
N82E16834314806.Cons: This laptop is far from perfect however, It's a windows 8 laptop, so the problems with OS that are still in effect here. However, the Classic Start Menu program I downloaded from the net made it much more useable. The touchpad is good, but not the most reliable. Sometimes it doesn't respond to movement unless you press hard on the pad. This happend on my old laptop too, so it may be an issue with my fingers... Anyway, the screen looks a bit "off" compared to normal laptops. And although it's 1080p, not all games will run well at that resolution. I'd also be lying if I said I was happy with only 3 usb ports, but I'm sure a USB hub will fix that problem. It has, for the record, only one audio jack that functions as a mic and a headphone jack. The headphone jack mode works, but each time you have to switch settings around in a menu to make sure it's on the right mode. It's annoying, especially when you are running full screen programs, plug something in, and get dumped to the desktop, but nothing I myself can't handle. Perhaps most disappointing is the lack of a disc drive, which is odd considering there's a big space for one on the side. Not sure what that's about..
N82E16834314806.Pros: I bought this laptop mainly for gaming, and I think it does the job decently. It's no alienware, but it's reasonable. MGR: Revengance, Mass Effect 2, and even Sonic Generations work pretty well after a bit of setting fiddling. On the hardware side, the backlit keyboard is useful for dark areas (as well as showing off to family members). Plus it's pretty light. The screen can bend nearly all the way back, which is impressive but also kind of scary for those who aren't used to that kind of flexibility. The sound is great with the Dolby Digital Plus software that's pre installed. And the battery life isn't half bad either.

In the 28 weeks of ownership, the Asus Ultrabook was only operational for half that time.  And a significant amount of that time was spent reloading lost programs and data!   ASUS=FAIL
N82E16834231310.Pros: When it wasn't broken down, it worked okay.

The i7 really kicks butt and the SSD boots up the computer super fast (<5 seconds). As for Adobe, it also works excellent handling Photoshop and Illustrator at a breeze.
1TS-005B-00011.Comments: This computer is probably in my opinion, one of the best cheap laptops out there. I wasn't even aware Huawei had Windows Laptops, as I've had Honor 8 and Mate 10 for a year (also great phones). If I could message Huawei, I'd say "Excellent work! Keep up the convenience and speeds!"

I have no confidence that I can use my computer for presentations, or in important meetings because I randomly lose everything I'm working on. A complete disappointment.
N82E16834315445.Pros: Love the large screen, fast boot time, large keyboard with full number pad. Big enough to handle storage of my photos, and run all the programs I need without slowing down. Great battery life. It's exactly what I wanted - for the first year.

N82E16834314645.Author: Brandon R.
N82E16834314645.Cons: Storage does not come as advertised. The machine does have 32GB, yes, however, what the manufacturer fails to tell you is that about 12GB of that is reserved for the OS and heaven knows what else on an unchangeable partition that can only be accessed through diskpart. Even then, about 12GB of space total is open when you first get it with all the bloatware installed. Also, the thing literally runs out of space for no reason. After installing office, Netflix, and Spotify, I was completely out of space. I can't even use Windows Update because I'm out of space. Thankfully, I was able to get it up to 600MB, but that's it.
N82E16834314645.Pros: It's a cheap laptop that runs Office, Chrome, Netlfix, and Spotify. Does exactly what I need it to do right now. The keyboard feels nice and the screen isn't glossy, which helps in brighter areas. The screen is decently lit on its highest setting. Rather unexpectedly, the trackpad supports multitouch, which is nice. Battery life is decent and the standby time is good as well. I can get about 5-7 hours of battery while doing basic tasks (browsing, office, etc.) with the screen at just above half brightness and the "balanced" power mode. The laptop can actually play some very, very old games alright. I have RCT3 and Star Wars EaW installed to an external USB drive.
N82E16834314645.Comments: So, in review, overall the laptop does what it needs to. It runs office and can browse the web. However, due to the lack of consistency of basic features such as the trackpad and the inexplicable loss of space, I personally could not recommend this product to anyone. I know it's cheap, but the HP Envy is too, and it's much more solid than this. Personally, I don't think I will buy another PC from Acer. They have other great products (such as the monitor I bought), but this laptop has turned me off from their other PCs. I hope you found this review helpful and thanks for reading!

N82E16834100953.Title: Avoid unless you can afford to gamble.
N82E16834100953.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834100953.Cons: - Took 30 minutes to complete initial setup and reach desktop. Yes, it is that slow. Beach balls for everybody.
N82E16834100953.Comments: I am very aware of what a refurbished laptop means and I am very aware of the expectations we all should have. These particular MacBooks suffer from small cracking usually near the hinge that never affects anything and should be expected. They are quite durable but plastic does scratch. A scratch is a scratch that typically can only been seen. A ding is an indent that has shifted or removed material. These things to some extent are acceptable. Specifically scratches. Surface scratches should be expected along the entire exterior. A few dings are acceptable. Not two dozen. Refurbished also means that the computer has been thoroughly cleaned and brought back to 100% functionality. This means the fan is moving air and not clogged with crud. Often refurb includes a new battery or one with low cycle count. Refurbished does not leave copious amounts of hair, dirt and liquid evidence inside.

So I submitted a replacement request and was supposed to get an RMA # and a free return shipping label. I got the RMA # within 30 seconds. Then I started waiting for my shipping label... and waiting, and waiting, and waiting, and waiting. After several hours I had to contact customer service to figure out where my shipping label was. After waiting for what seemed like forever (several YouTube videos watched later) I finally got in touch with someone and found out no shipping label was created for my RMA! They then FINALLY emailed me the shipping label.
N82E16834100953.Comments: I think buying this was a MASSIVE mistake!

It also does not come pre-loaded with any bloatware, and it runs longer than I would have expected on battery. The materials do not hold onto grease, and I get lot of compliments on the look. The support staff of Razer is very helpful.
N82E16834326009.Comments: Still the best thing I have bought with a motherboard, and I have built computer's myself before.

N82E16834326009.Title: Almost Perfect
N82E16834326009.Author: Shawn H.
N82E16834326009.Comments: I wanted the sexy Macbook look with the performance and flexibility of a PC. This gave it to me.

N82E16834326009.Title: Razer Blade
N82E16834326009.Author: Evan S.
N82E16834326009.Cons: Looking through the pcb for the motherboard everything is soldered down, the upgradeability is essentially zero, that is unless you have access to a BGA rework machine.
N82E16834326009.Pros: Really slick, and really fast.  It's also a laptop, this isn't a simple desktop replacement.
N82E16834326009.Comments: I'm not entirely sure how much support there is for linux on this machine, so little has been written on attempting to do so.

N82E16834295285.Title: Great workhorse of a notebook
N82E16834295285.Author: Mike A.
N82E16834295285.Cons: - The brick of a power adapter is touchy. If I move it the wrong way, the connection is lost, so I've got it stationed in a place where it's seldom bumped accidentally and the LED power light is obvious.
N82E16834295285.Pros: - Works fantastically out of the box
N82E16834295285.Comments: This is a very heavy notebook. I wouldn't necessarily suggest this as a traveler's machine, but it's powerful, so if you don't mind the weight or if you don't plan to move it around much, this is definitely for you.

N82E16834295285.Title: Good computer; Works great
N82E16834295285.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834295285.Comments: -Great choice for an engineer with a fast processor and huge screen

N82E16834295285.Title: Amazing value.
N82E16834295285.Author: Derek D.
N82E16834295285.Cons: - Not necessarily a con for me but may be for others. Big and bulky. You will not want to carry this thing around. This is more of a workstation machine and that's okay for my needs. Depends on what you want.
N82E16834295285.Pros: - JoySystems has refurbished this thing to the Nth degree. There isn't a scratch on it. Practically brand new. I had it up and running in about 2 hours with all updates installed, ready to fly... And that it does.
N82E16834295285.Comments: I would recommend this machine to anyone and JoySystems will give you a gift card for leaving them a review on a few popular sites. Who does that? Apparently they do and I won't hesitate to recommend them to anyone who is in the market for a refurb.

N82E16834295285.Title: Amazing Refurbished Laptop!
N82E16834295285.Author: Adam W.
N82E16834295285.Cons: Minor mark on the screen but its to be expected with a refurbished laptop
N82E16834295285.Comments: I would HIGHLY recommend this product.

N82E16834295285.Title: Easy to set up affordable PC!
N82E16834295285.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834295285.Cons: - Had a couple dings but it's all good mayne
N82E16834295285.Pros: -Works awesome for a low price, was larger than expected but whatever

N82E16834295285.Title: Just What I Wanted
N82E16834295285.Author: James L.
N82E16834295285.Cons: A bit of a hassle registering windows but Joy systems got the issue resolved quickly.
N82E16834295285.Pros: I got a professional grade laptop for a great price.  No bloatware.  There are some nicks & scratches but everything works fine.  I had a problem registering windows 10 but Joy systems sent an installation CD that I received  in 4 days.  For me, details are important.  Joy systems had the unit packaged like new, clean, and had an instruction sheet when you opened the cover.  I got exactly what I wanted.
N82E16834295285.Comments: I would purchase again and would recommend this unit & joy Systems to others.  This is a work station laptop, not a fluff-stuff unit from a chain store.

N82E16834295285.Title: Great product at a great price!
N82E16834295285.Author: Jeho L.
N82E16834295285.Cons: Packaging is a bit lacking, in terms of product protection, but the product works flawless once booted.
N82E16834295285.Pros: Our company has bought 2 refurbished laptops from the same refurbisher and we are definitely happy with the quality and the price ! Fast shipping and the laptop works flawlessly!
N82E16834295285.Comments: i would definitely recommend without hesitation!

N82E16834295285.Title: Great heavy duty laptop
N82E16834295285.Author: Michele K.
N82E16834295285.Cons: The touchpad is super sensitive, I have trouble using it, but it could just be my hands.  The power cord battery box is massive, as other reviews stated, but seriously even larger than I was expecting.  I've hidden it in a box made to sort/hide cables and it's fine.
N82E16834295285.Pros: If you are looking for a rugged laptop, this is it.  I have physical disabilities and use my laptop 12+ hours a day from my recliner.  It's always getting shoved aside or dropped or walked on by cats and dogs.  The last one literally fell apart in my hands, the hinges finally gave way and the monitor was only hooked to the keyboard by wires.  This is my second Dell, and I love their keyboard layout.  Even with disfigured hands, I can type without too many errors on the Dell layout versus other laptops.  This Dell also has a heavy case, you can tell it's built to be used and to last.  The supplier (JoySystems) is an authorized Microsoft refurbisher and has good reviews, so I felt comfortable buying refurbished. The shipping was fast, set up was easy and the updates needed loaded pretty well over the course of a day.  Had to restart once, it shut down during an update, but it worked the second time and all was good.
N82E16834295285.Comments: Overall, it is what it says it is at a good price.

N82E16834235015.Title: Missing Component
N82E16834235015.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834235015.Cons: It did not have the NVIDIA graphics card. Just the on-board Intel graphics.
N82E16834235015.Pros: This would have been a heck of a deal. It even did have the NVIDIA sticker on it.
N82E16834235015.Comments: This was not what I ordered. Product has been returned with a RMA. Waiting to find out how this will be resolved.

N82E16834235015.Title: So far so good
N82E16834235015.Author: Sahib M.
N82E16834235015.Cons: Laptop starts to heat even a few minutes after usage.  Thus, I can't even put it on my lap for a few minutes. The screen and everything else seems to be made of plastic.
N82E16834235015.Pros: I got this laptop a few weeks ago for college. So far it has been great for browsing, watching Netflix, etc. The startup time for this laptop is between 5-10 seconds so that's also a plus. The touchpad is very responsive. Battery life is as advertised. Probably 6-8 hrs or so for light browsing.
N82E16834235015.Comments: Incredibly fast. I did not try any games on the laptop yet, so I wouldn't be able to know how the graphics card is. My friend, who also has the same laptop, said he was able to run League and Csgo at 120 fps so I guess its good for some minor gaming too. Besides the heat issue I dont really have any problem with the laptop. I got it on sale too so all in all Im satisfied with the purchase.

N82E16834235015.Title: So far so good
N82E16834235015.Author: KT L.
N82E16834235015.Cons: The fan noise is very noticeable during the boot up. It's not stressing to the max but after I let the laptop sit for a little bit the noise gets minimal. However, if I start running softwares immediately after the startup then the noise that is noticeable prolongs a bit longer than I would like. Not too big of a deal for me since I ran some videos and programs and the fan still is not stressing like the startup process. I have not tried running softwares after I turn my pc on from sleep mode rather then turning it off.
N82E16834235015.Pros: It's thin, light, finger print works well and so far no technical issues. The processing speed is not bad for a laptop either. Boots up fairly quick. The graphics is good for me as well. It's not a gaming laptop but YouTube videos run great. The audio sounds great to me as well for a laptop.

N82E16834235015.Title: Great laptop except that Webcam is really bad
N82E16834235015.Author: Mastewal M.
N82E16834235015.Cons: - Worst webcam I have ever encountered. It is a VGA webcam during this era? Seriously?
N82E16834235015.Comments: If you you are not going to use skype and all visual communication, this laptop can be good. If you are going to use it to skype, Zoom or Webex, dont buy this laptop. You may lose your job application due to worst webcam. I have kept mine for other purposes and use my 10 year old mac for skyping for business purposes.

N82E16834235015.Title: Not good as expected
N82E16834235015.Author: Md R.
N82E16834235015.Cons: Now I don't know why but Everytime I buy a laptop I get the bad ones. I get a blue death screen in my first two days of using it and i got it again 3 more times so I tried factory resetting but didn't help. Updated drivers and did everything I could but to no avail. Battery life is also mediocre and the keyboard is horrible. Really bad typing experience tbh.
N82E16834235015.Pros: Decent performance esp with nvidia card it was fast and stuff and smooth browsing

N82E16834235015.Title: Not as advertised
N82E16834235015.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834235015.Pros: This Asus Vivo Book S510UN-MS52 is advertised on the Newegg website as having an illuminated keyboard.  It does not.  Having that feature was one of the main reasons I purchased it.  Newegg, please get your facts straight.  It keeps everyone from going through a lot of hassles and returns.
N82E16834235015.Comments: Would've been perfect if it was as adevrtised.

N82E16834235015.Title: Good overall
N82E16834235015.Author: Evan M.
N82E16834235015.Cons: Webcam is terrible. I can’t find any specifications on it.

N82E16834235015.Title: Great Laptop for all around usage
N82E16834235015.Author: Anthony D.
N82E16834235015.Pros: - Decent battery life(3-4 hours on full brightness for me when watching 1080p YouTube videos)
N82E16834235015.Comments: I bought this laptop to use for college and also use it for a little bit of gaming here and there. So far I love it, and the only thing I would change is the speakers, otherwise, it has performed above my expectations. This is a little powerhouse for a little amount of money and I do not regret my decision to purchase. Hopefully it will last me my 4-5 years of college, and if any problems arise I will report back. This is a very good laptop for someone who needs something they can do schoolwork, light gaming, streaming, and some engineering programs. I give this laptop 4 Eggs as it is affordable, good bang for the buck, and easily upgradeable.

N82E16834246621.Title: Poor Motherboard Reliability
N82E16834246621.Author: Joshua B.
N82E16834246621.Cons: -Poor wifi connectivity; there was a class action lawsuit around 2014.
N82E16834246621.Pros: -mSATA port, allows SSD installation along with the 2.5 inch SATA regular hard drive.
N82E16834246621.Comments: This review is for Lenovo's U310 laptops in general, not any particular seller.

N82E16834246621.Title: Almost everything you hoped for
N82E16834246621.Author: Linvel R.
N82E16834246621.Cons: It does come with bloatware, which is to be expected from most companies. You can clear this up by "cleanbooting" it. It does also have a wifi configuration, which can be fixed by googling the laptop model and the term "wifi problems" Update it to Windows 8.1 and it should get smoother in terms of running.  Lenovo's tech support could be better, but the online community does a great job of handling it.
N82E16834246621.Pros: A solid laptop with an above average processor and an average amount of RAM. Touchscreen was extremely responsive. Pretty cheap for an ultrabook.
N82E16834246621.Comments: A lot of bad reviews on here are made by people who don't understand laptops or the basis that people buy computers. Most people, especially tech savvy ones won't try to modify laptops hardware wise without first giving it a professional check.  The bad reviews spawn from amateurs who didn't know what they're doing.

N82E16834246621.Title: Re-Review: OS now on the SSD
N82E16834246621.Author: Adrian T.
N82E16834246621.Cons: - Trackpad is still kinda weird, it has this thing I don't like where the LMB and RMB are also touch-sensitive to the cursor. Without practice, clicking around will be seriously annoying in the beginning. Before when I said it was overly-sensitive, that was more of a Chrome issue than anything, I don't have that issue with Mozilla.
N82E16834246621.Pros: (Now that the OS is on the SSD, and I've had a little more in-depth experience with the laptop as a whole, I believe a whole new review is reasonable. It's up to Newegg to post it. My older review is under the nickname "Incubus".)
N82E16834246621.Comments: As I mentioned before, I tried to install Windows 7 on the SSD myself. Hint: Don't do it. If you want the OS on the SSD, you have to try to convince Lenovo to do it for you. I managed to, after the hard drive and OS basically bricked and they accepted to do it through warranty, making a faulty hard-drive replacement claim when I explained to them that attempting to re-install the OS through alternatives methods showed no sign of any of my drives, ever, at all. I sent it in, they sent it back.

N82E16834246621.Title: Nice design, Bad Wifi
N82E16834246621.Author: Yvonne C.
N82E16834246621.Cons: The WiFi barely works. There is no CD/DVD which isn't a huge deal except most WiFi adapters require you to install it with a CD.
N82E16834246621.Pros: It's thin and light. The interior looks like a MacBook.
N82E16834246621.Comments: Not a fan of the slow processor, but for the price, you can't really expect much.

N82E16834246621.Title: Good Ultrabook for the Price
N82E16834246621.Author: Anand S.
N82E16834246621.Cons: - 1366x768 display resolution is a bit low
N82E16834246621.Pros: - Thin, sleek form factor, looks a lot like a Macbook Pro with the chiclet style keyboard and brushed aluminum look
N82E16834246621.Comments: I bought this for my mother to use for surfing the web and using Microsoft Office. Works wonderful for this type of usage, though most likely disadvantageous for gaming.

N82E16834246621.Title: Good Cheap Ultrabook
N82E16834246621.Author: ERP I.
N82E16834246621.Cons: The hinges fitting on my machine is a little bit off and the lid catches on the left side when I open it. At this point, it is not worth hassling with since the machine is finally configured the way I want it.
N82E16834246621.Pros: The machine is designed as a low end ultrabook and with a little bit of effort, it can be a very fast machine. I increased the RAM to 8GB and upgraded to Windows 8PRO to boot up from the SSD. It is worth taking the time to format all the drives and reinstall the OS on the SSD and leave the hard drive for files.
N82E16834246621.Comments: I am a road warrior with chronic fatigue issues and needed a fairly high speed laptop with adequate storage and also weigh as little as possible. This has been a life saver for me in an excellent combination of weight, cost and performance options.

N82E16834246621.Title: excellent xmas present for girlfriend
N82E16834246621.Author: Ryan M.
N82E16834246621.Cons: - doesn't come with Bluetooth, bought a tiny USB adapter to connect her Jambox
N82E16834246621.Pros: very lightweight, thin, fast enough to play Torchlight II
N82E16834246621.Comments: My girlfriend is extremely happy with this laptop and so far it can play any games she has tried, the most intensive one being Torchlight II.

N82E16834246621.Title: wireless is junk
N82E16834246621.Author: Eddie L.
N82E16834246621.Cons: As others have stated. Wireless is junk don't think there is any solutions, I'm using a USB wifi adapter in it's place.
N82E16834246621.Pros: It's a nice looking laptop. Nice finish on the exterior lid.
N82E16834246621.Comments: For $450(how much i paid) it's good value if you can look pass the wireless issue.

1TS-000D-001N2.Title: Wish they had five more.
1TS-000D-001N2.Author: Michael S.
1TS-000D-001N2.Cons: I have no real complaints, I ordered 5 similar computers from another vendor on this site and wish I had instead purchased all of my computers from this vendor.
1TS-000D-001N2.Pros: These served the purpose of field work computers for construction sites. The quality and attention to the referb was great.
1TS-000D-001N2.Comments: With a quick OS reinstall, an ssd, and some cleaning I have two nice working computers that while a bit scuffed (they're used) are suitable for my need.

1TS-000D-001N2.Title: Fast after easy upgrade
1TS-000D-001N2.Author: Kenneth N.
1TS-000D-001N2.Cons: Video chip is meh. HD is small. Not a lot of memory. Has USB2 ports only. Is SATA2. Remember this is a business machine, intended to link to a company server, and not intended for a gaming rig at all.
1TS-000D-001N2.Pros: Well-packed and arrived in excellent condition. Clean and everything worked properly. Solid machine; no flex or cracks or dings or bad scratches. i7 processor. Easy to upgrade. Cooling seems good. Came with OS installation disk, HP software disk. Has a 56K modem, decent LAN and wireless speed, VGA  port, Express slot good for a USB3 card, has an SD card slot.
1TS-000D-001N2.Comments: Immediately removed the bloatware, installed 100+ Windows updates, installed 8GB good DDR3, installed 500GB SSD, cleaned the caches and registry and voila! I had a FAST machine with some decent capacity. It seemed a shame to let an i7 stay shackled to slow hardware.

1TS-000D-001N2.Title: So far, so good, it could be worse
1TS-000D-001N2.Author: Robert L.
1TS-000D-001N2.Cons: I'm sure this is a case by case basis, but the laptop I received, almost every time the left mouse button sticks. Luckily it's definitely useable and the mouse buttons above the trackpad for the g nub work fine. My wife will be the deciding factor if I pursue the vendor or not, this is for her.
1TS-000D-001N2.Pros: Pretty much as advertised!, everything is here along with a resource disk. That being said I did install 8.1 right away and everything is working fine. I haven't noticed any problems other than two flaws that I'll get to. I'm typing this on the laptop now
1TS-000D-001N2.Comments: It's a good machine, and was expertly packaged but it came with a screw loose and I need to take an egg for the faulty mouse button.

1TS-000D-001N2.Title: Perfectly Processed
1TS-000D-001N2.Author: Michael G.
1TS-000D-001N2.Pros: This is for my son for Christmas. I was a little nervous about the purchase as there wasn't any feedback on the seller. The system is exactly as advertised. It shipped within 2 Days, was packaged beautifully, and arrived in great shape. It is a refurb, but well worth it in my opinion. I see no dent's or scratches, which would have been acceptable if there were. It is a nice clean install of 7, so I don't have to wipe it and start over. I'm putting AVG and SpyBot on it now, as well as Chrome. It has passed all scans so far. I will do a Bios check, but I don't think I'll see anything wrong.  Great system for the price. To get an I7 at this level, WITH stand alone graphics, was something I was unable to find, and I jumped on this the second I saw it. You give up an inch in screen, but it's a rugged little case, and there are HDMI and VGA ports to plug an external monitor in if you so choose. It comes with the standard bloat ware, but I'll remove that soon enough.
1TS-000D-001N2.Comments: A shout out to Core Technologies Inc. If my experience is as clean as others in the future, I think you'll see their rating skyrocket.

N82E16834725059.Title: very nice laptop!
N82E16834725059.Author: Jordan S.
N82E16834725059.Cons: fan can get a little loud
N82E16834725059.Comments: it's a great laptop. personally the fan isn't too loud for me, but i know it could bother others. it personally was worth upgrading to.

N82E16834312811.Title: Don't buy this!
N82E16834312811.Author: Ruby B.
N82E16834312811.Cons: Screen freezes, keys will not work, totally unable to use
N82E16834312811.Comments: We purchased this computer for my daughter to use in the college setting.  We will definately NOT buy from this company again.

N82E16834312811.Title: Lenovo u310 touch review
N82E16834312811.Author: Frieda L.
N82E16834312811.Cons: 1) Plastic hinges, wish they would have went with some aluminum hinges
N82E16834312811.Pros: 1) Touch display is very smooth and works flawlessly
N82E16834312811.Comments: 1) Replaced the HDD/SSD combo with a single Samsung 840 250GB SSD for a gain in performance/battery life

N82E16834312811.Title: Stylish, powerful, but with a few setbacks
N82E16834312811.Author: Michael S.
N82E16834312811.Cons: 1. Battery life could be better, 5 hours max is enough for me, but some people need 7 - 10 to be happy.
N82E16834312811.Pros: 1. Performance is very good for a budget ultrabook.
N82E16834312811.Comments: Main set of thoughts is presented here.

N82E16834312811.Title: Lenovo U310 (8GB)
N82E16834312811.Author: David H.
N82E16834312811.Cons: the screen doesn't bend back that far
N82E16834312811.Comments: it's basically a nice laptop... got it for $599 during a daily deal sale, so worth the money. the 8GB model versus the 4GB RAM model def. helps to move the computer along, and the i5 chip seems powerful enough to handle most applications. Since the screen is small, it's portable and good for school or business, but the resolution really is lacking and you feel as though you have way less desktop real estate than you really do... esp, if you are running two docs side by side, you really can't see much. But I knew that going in, but really wish there was a way to have upgraded the resolution.

N82E16834312811.Title: Great entry ultrabook!
N82E16834312811.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834312811.Cons: A few things to pick on. For one thing, there is no indentation or tab on the lid so opening it up can be a little  difficult. The fan always runs. Its not loud, but when working in a quiet environment, like in a library, it is noticeable.
N82E16834312811.Pros: Have had this laptop going on to 8 months now. Build quality is spectacular, and its very fast. Battery life is good. I usually average about 4.5hrs with regular browsing. The screen is plenty bright.  I rarely have it on full bright mode.
N82E16834312811.Comments: I bought it while it was on sale, and had a free tablet thrown in. I would say its one of the best, if not the best ultrabook in its class. I did not experience any of the problems with wifi that some others have mentioned. However, I did update all my drivers as soon as I got it so that probably helped. I also disabled the pinch zoom feature because it can be very annoying at times.  Although its not the ultrabook's fault, Windows 8 is completely atrocious!

N82E16834312811.Title: Good Buy
N82E16834312811.Author: John M.
N82E16834312811.Cons: Hybrid drive doesn't seem to do much for boot time. Runs fast otherwise.
N82E16834312811.Pros: I had a 17" laptop before this and needed something much more compact and light. This does the trick. Small, good battery life (6+ hours with 40-50% MAX CPU and 30-40% brightness), and fast after initially booting up (5400 RPM HDD can take ~20-30 seconds). Love the USB 3.0 and HDMI outs
N82E16834312811.Comments: Over all, I'm enjoying this little beauty, although I don't use the touch screen that often. Compact but good for some medium to heavy tasks.

N82E16834312811.Title: Good Basic Computer
N82E16834312811.Author: Brian D.
N82E16834312811.Comments: Good computer for the $.  Couldn't find anything with comparable specs at this price.  No issues yet with WiFI, maybe they fixed it??

N82E16834312811.Title: Size, weight, touchscreen, SD slot, 8GB RAM, 802.11n
N82E16834312811.Author: Lingming Y.
N82E16834312811.Cons: Bootup a little slow (near one minutes), do not have D-Sub connection (need to use HDMI or US convert to it).
N82E16834312811.Pros: Light weight, nice touch, extra SD card read slot, 8GB RAM package

N82E16834316125.Title: Laptop Review Update. Don't buy
N82E16834316125.Author: Elvin S.
N82E16834316125.Comments: It's been about two years with the laptop and since my last review. Overall it has worked great if it weren't for one main issue. It is great for school and light gaming. The screen isn't the best but for the price it is fine. However about 9 months in the keyboard would keep acting up and certain keys would not work without having to spam them. It would do this every once in a while. After the first year, about 10 keys were completely unusable. Popping the battery in and out fixes the problem temporarily. Other reviews have stated previously the same issue. Only doing the update to confirm that this is a common issue and recommending users to spend their money elsewhere.

N82E16834316125.Title: UPDATE Alanis K.
N82E16834316125.Author: Alanis K.
N82E16834316125.Comments: At the time of last reviewing, I mentioned I would update. At this point in time, there are some keys that have completely stopped working. Off the top of my head I specifically remember, the 1 key at the top of the keyboard, as well as the u, the right arrow key, the 5 on the number pad to the right, and I believe the t. In the past, I only had to spam these buttons for a while and they'd work. Now they will not work at all no matter what I do. Other keys still work after spamming them, including the space bar, and the left arrow. Most others function normally. It's rather disappointing. While browsing online for a way to fix this, I've found that others with this exact model have had no success completely fixing it. Also, some other Acer laptops have had this issue but it seems users can fix those, so it appears to only be this exact model that cannot be fixed. I did not buy a laptop intending to use a separate keyboard and certainly not the onscreen one. I had hoped to continue to easily bring this to school or when visiting friends but now I have to bring a usb keyboard as well, which is obviously a bit of a hassle. If I had encountered this problem in time to return the laptop I would have. But it has been around 2 years that I've had it now (it started a while ago) and based on others' experiences with sending it to get repaired, only for the problem to come back immediately or shortly after, I won't be wasting the money to get it repaired anywhere. As I said it's disappointing. I shopped around for a bit before choosing this laptop, and otherwise it functions very well for the price. So if you don't mind using a separate keyboard, it's not as big a deal.

N82E16834316125.Author: HARI D.
N82E16834316125.Cons: windows 10 would surely crash witin a year and you need to run behind the manufacturer to fix it
N82E16834316125.Pros: it looks good, just the looks

N82E16834316125.Title: Not completely as advertised
N82E16834316125.Author: Peter S.
N82E16834316125.Cons: Came with 4GB of ram rather than 8...
N82E16834316125.Comments: Although there are many good things about this product, the advertisement of 8GB of RAM and being sent only four was a big let down.

N82E16834316125.Title: Out of the box, an average laptop.  Upgraded with an M.2 SSD and a 2.5" SSD however, this is a rocket ship!
N82E16834316125.Author: Kevin H.
N82E16834316125.Cons: Only one RAM slot, has 4GB permanently attached to the mainboard.  BIOS is very unfriendly.  No provision for booting from USB stick when the main drive has no partition on it like most other BIOS's do.  In order to load a clean install of windows, I had to clone the shipped OS onto an M.2, then upgrade from a jump drive while Windows was running.  Would be much easier if I could boot to USB easily without disabling UEFI.
N82E16834316125.Pros: Easily upgradable.  You can add an M.2 SSD, and replace the very slow WD Blue 1TB drive it contains with a much faster 2.5" SSD.  It looks nice, light, good screen, good battery life.
N82E16834316125.Comments: Very good all around laptop.  The stock load on the drive tends to be slow, the stock hard drive is slow, but if you spend an extra $150 or so, you can upgrade it with an SSD or two and have a very fast laptop for the money.

N82E16834316125.Title: Keyboard Broken after a while?

N82E16834235097.Author: Anonymous
N82E16834235097.Cons: - The most prominent con is the speakers. They are, in lightest terms, meek. They take on the appearance of 2 small vents at the bottom of the laptop. Definitely not great for listening to music, or gaming, or really anything. To compare, my iPhone XR at half volume easily outperforms this laptop at maximum volume. Just something to keep in mind. This can be easily solved with a pair of cheap headphones.
N82E16834235097.Pros: - Upon opening the box, you will notice how premium the laptop looks. It's quite the looker.
N82E16834235097.Comments: As I mentioned, I'm not anywhere near as well-versed in computers and their specs as the other reviewers. That being said, this is the honest perspective from a student who really needed a laptop, but also wanted an investment. I sincerely believe that this budget laptop is perfect for someone who needs a fast, light laptop that can get the job done, and maybe play some games or watch some movies after all that work. So far, it has served me well, with the aforementioned cons. None of the mentioned cons were huge deal-breakers, they were just just nuisances. If you travel a lot and need a lot of battery life, want a powerhouse that can run your favorite games at ultra-level graphics, then look somewhere else. All-in-all, it's a pretty good deal for what you get.

Despite what I wish, this is still one of the better laptops I have ever had. No…It doesn’t check every box for me, but it comes close. Everything ASUS did here has clear indications of their intention to deliver one of the best all-around laptops within a reasonable price range. They nailed it. Shortcomings are easily overlookable in my opinion.

Doing so will wipe out all the included bloatware, which is so severe it bogs down the system to an almost frozen state. I additionally recommend upgrading the HDD and the RAM as soon as possible. If you can only upgrade one, upgrade the HDD. 500 GB 7200 rpm drives are easy to find and inexpensive, and the difference is like night and day. A SSD would be even better. I am much happier with my G50 after upgrading. When upgrading the RAM, make sure you purchase  low voltage compatible sticks, or it will not run correctly.
